Steps To Reproduce:
1.  Add EMF Model;
2.  Model Importer = XML Schema
3.  enter uri = http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imsqti_v2p1.xsd

This isn't an EMF Validation problem; the XSD component is where XSD-to-Ecore conversion is implemented.

Created an attachment (id=73195)
Patches to fix problems associated with this model

The changes include code to turn off the XyzPackage.Literals generation for large models, not using EJavaObject for union-based EDataTypes without a common base type, not validating multiple ID EAttributes as incorrect for a DocumentRoot EClass, as well as the null pointer fix for importing the null namespace without a schema location.
Changes to fix this an related problems are committed to CVS.
*** Bug 197132 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
